Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine

Interface TimerContainer

All Superinterfaces:
TimerListProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
SplashScene
public interface TimerContainer
extends TimerListProvider
When implementing this interface, the setupTimers() method needs to be implemented. This interface can be used with both a YaegerScene and en YaegerEntity and ensures that the method setupTimers() is being called during initialization of such an object.

THe body of setupTimers() should be used to add instances of Timer, using the exposed method addTimer(Timer). These timers will then be registered and added to the Game-loop.

A Timer that is instantiated, but not added in this way, will not work.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void addTimer​(Timer timer)
    Use this method to add any Timer that is required by the YaegerScene or YaegerEntity in which it is instantiated.
    default Updatable callTimers()  
    default void initTimers()
    Annotated with OnActivation, this method will be called during activation.
    void setupTimers()
    Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method addTimer(Timer) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

    Methods inherited from interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.TimerListProvider

    getTimers

  • Method Details

    • addTimer

      default void addTimer​(Timer timer)
      Use this method to add any Timer that is required by the YaegerScene or YaegerEntity in which it is instantiated.
      Parameters:
      timer - The Timer that needs to be added.

    • initTimers

      default void initTimers()
      Annotated with OnActivation, this method will be called during activation. First it will clear any timers from a previous activation, after which it will call setupTimers().

    • setupTimers

      void setupTimers()
      Only instances of Timer that are registered with the method addTimer(Timer) within this method are registered and will receive an animation update.

    • callTimers

      default Updatable callTimers()
